patthana19.4:0.2_0: (These should be expanded as in SN 45.)
patthana19.4:0.3_0: Standing on the bank of the river.
patthana19.4:1.1_0: One with an external grasp of grasping doesn’t give rise to these three kinds of grasping.
patthana19.4:2.1_0: One doesn’t give rise to fervor for the almsbowl because of grasping, and someone else to arise.
patthana19.4:3.1_0: One doesn’t give rise to diversity of perceptions, and describes the causes of grasping.
patthana19.4:5.1_0: Neither based on external stimuliving, and appropriate for the three kinds of grasping.
patthana19.4:7.1_0: The eighteen bases for psychic power ...
patthana19.4:7.1_2: He has the seven results of deeds ...
